title: Possible Site Downtime or Domain Change
body:
Due to some troubles with my domain name, this site may go down soon for unknown period of time or forever. In the latter case the new domain (which name I didn’t think of) will arise and information about it will be posted on sites I upload to. Fingers crossed none of the above events will happen, but fasten your seat belts and prepare for a crash.

Keep an eye on this list for my future repacks.

https://1337x.to/user/FitGirl/

You may also join my unofficial Discord community and wait for news in there.

https://discord.gg/GmTJ5Rm

Update, August 30: The situation is now going in the good direction, though not FINALLY fixed. I will update this post later.

Update, September 3: The issue has been resolved.
